citations.narrative:
The facility's contingency plan could not be located for review. This plan should provide details on how the facility
manages the humane handling, treatment, transportation and care of their animals in the event of an emergency or
disaster. This plan should be maintained at the facility for APHIS inspections and reviewed annually.
Correct by: Oct 1, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility's contingency plan could not be located for review. This plan should provide details on how the facility 
manages the humane handling, treatment, transportation and care of their animals in the event of an emergency or 
disaster. This plan should be maintained at the facility for APHIS inspections and reviewed annually.  
Correct by: Oct 1, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
